ticket.title: failing test for broken count with select in named_scope
ticket.original-body:
When I provide :select option in named_scope and then ask for count or any?, or exists?, it tries to make count not of "#{quoted_table_name}.#{primary_key}", as it is in base.rb:692, but SELECT count(posts.id, posts.title, posts.author_id), as in test, applied.
I've only provided test, seems that problem is in reverse merge.
